title: Spotting Sleepers and Remembering Dwight Clark | GM Street (Ep. 269)
description:
The Ringer’s Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier project some sleepers based on strength of schedules (04:00), discuss Mike McCarthy's philosophy about vets and minicamp (14:30), and share some memories of Dwight Clark (37:45).

Credits:
Hosted by: Michael Lombardi and Tate Frazier
Produced by: Jim Cunningham
Brought to you by: The Ringer Podcast Network
